attributes.action: Make bullies do community service or cleaning and litter picking at school.
attributes.background: Enough is enough. Schools are not following their behaviour policies or not being strict enough. So I want put in place the minute bullying is being reported, the bully to do litter picking or cleaning or some type of unpaid work and to have to eat lunch in isolation with reports. Time to act!

rejection.details: It's up to schools to decide how to deal with bullying. You could suggest this idea to your school's governing body.
